comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Princess Helen of Greece and Denmark (Greek: Πριγκίπισσα Ελένη της Ελλάδας και Δανίας) (2 May/3 May 1896 – 28 November 1982) was the wife of King Carol II of Romania and the mother of King Michael I of Romania. She held the title Queen Mother of Romania. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_of_Greece_and_Denmark
